title: Centre Protecting Farmers: Finance Minister On Doubling Fertiliser Subsidy - NDTV
content: Centre Protecting Farmers: Finance Minister On Doubling Fertiliser Subsidy  NDTV
description: Union Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman on Saturday said that the government has protected farmers from the rise in prices of fertilizers globally and an additional amount of Rs 1.10 lakh crore is being provided.
